body:
I was wondering 
WHAT in the world, how do I delete mt post??
body_tagged:
I was wondering 
WHAT in the world, how do I delete mt post??
title: How do you delet post?

replies.body:
Ouch, you've recorded my phrase ._.
I feel myself a cap
replies.body_tagged:
Ouch, you've recorded my phrase ._.
I feel myself a cap

replies.body:
Unfortunately, it is impossible to completely delete your post so it never occurred, however you can edit the post to delete its content and then archive it so it is not automatically shown when someone opens the thread. To do this, click "edit" and then "archive".

Regards, 

Myworld.
replies.body_tagged:
